headline: Has Progressive’s Recent Slide Created an Opportunity for Investors in 2025?
summary: Have you found yourself staring at Progressive’s stock chart, wondering if it’s finally time to make your move or sit tight a little longer? It’s the kind of question that even seasoned investors wrestle with, especially when you see a household name like Progressive swing noticeably this year. After an impressive run over the past three to five years, with the share price up 74.0% and 163.1% respectively, its recent stumble may be turning heads. The stock is down 2.9% in the last seven days,...

headline: Barclays Lowers PT on The Progressive Corporation (PGR), Keeps an Equal Weight
summary: ​The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) is one of the Most Undervalued Long Term Stocks to Buy Right Now. On October 20, Alex Scott from Barclays lowered the firm’s price target on The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) from $271 to $257, while keeping an Equal Weight rating on the stock.
